title: Kalms Tablets 200 Tablets
description: View Kalms tablets 200 tablets. Available online today at Boots.
cleaned_text: 200 Tablets 3 for 2 on selected Vitamins and Supplements - cheapest free See details below, always read the label Suitable for: Adults aged 18 years & over Active ingredients: Valerian Root Extract In order to buy non-prescription medicines you must be a registered user of our site as we are obliged to record your transaction history. We also ask that you complete our questionnaire so our pharmacy team can check that this product is suitable for you to buy. You cannot add this item to the customer's basket Disabled or chronically sick people can claim VAT relief on purchases for personal or domestic use that are applicable to their disability or sickness. Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [](javascript:;) Collect 27 Boots Advantage Card points with this purchase [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) A traditional herbal medicinal product used for the temporary relief of: Symptoms associated with stress such as mild anxiety based on traditional use only. Do not take more than the label tells you to. Suitable for Suitable for adults 18 years and over and the elderly. Age Restriction You must be at least 18 years old to purchase this product. How to use Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use. Directions For temporary relief of symptoms associated with stress Adults and the elderly: Take 2 tablets three times per day with water after meals. Maximum daily dose is 6 tablets. Do not take: - if you are allergic to any of the ingredients - if you are pregnant or breastfeeding - if you are under 18 years old - if you are already taking a medicine for stress or anxiety - if you are taking a medicine to help you sleep Hazards and Cautions Kalms Day tablets may make you feel sleepy. If affected do not drive or use machines. The sedative effects of this medicine may be increased by alcohol. Therefore alcohol should be avoided whilst taking this medicine. If symptoms worsen, or do not improve after 4 weeks consult your doctor. Keep out of the reach and sight of children Storage Do not store above 25°C. Store in the original packaging with the leaflet. Do not use after the expiry date shown on the label. Precautions - This is a medicine; Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have an underlying medical condition, are taking any other medication or complementary therapy, or if symptoms persist - Seek advice before using if you are breast feeding, pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or suffer from allergies Active ingredients Valerian Root Extract Ingredients Active ingredients: Active ingredients per coated tablet: 33.75mg of Extract (as dry extract) from Valerian root (Valeriana officinalis L.)
